Pre-Game Insights: The T20 World Cup 2022 Semifinal 1 between New Zealand and Pakistan is scheduled for November 9, 2022, at Sydney Cricket Ground.
Babar Azam and Md. Rizwan need to recover their form for Pakistan to perform well.
Md. Harris, Shan Masood, Shadab Khan, and Iftikhar Ahmed have contributed heavily in the middle order for Pakistan.
Shaheen Afridi, Naseem Shah, and Hari Rauf are key to limiting New Zealand's batters.
Devon Conway started New Zealand's campaign with a brilliant 94 off 58 balls against Australia.
Glenn Phillips scored an incredible ton against Sri Lanka.
Kane Williamson scored a brilliant 61 off 35 balls against Ireland.
Tim Southee and Trent Boult need to bring their A-game against Pakistan.
Lockie Ferguson, Mitchell Santner, and Ish Sodhi are equally important for New Zealand.
New Zealand must not take Pakistan lightly as they recently defeated New Zealand to clinch the tri-series.
